item.title: Famitsu Review Scores: Issue 1893
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/famitsu-review-scores-issue-1893

  • Luna
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Assassin's Creed Shadows and more scored.

This week’s Famitsu review scores are in.

  • Assassin’s Creed Shadows (PS5, Xbox Series) – 9/8/10/9 [36/40]
  • MLB The Show 25 (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch) – 7/8/7/8 [30/40]
  • PROGRESS ORDERS (Switch) – 7/7/7/7 [28/40]
  • Snow Bros. 2 Special (Switch) – 7/7/7/7 [28/40]
  • Star Overdrive (Switch) – 7/7/7/9 [30/40]

Thanks, Ryokutya2089.

item.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth Battle Chronicle for PS5, PS4 to end service on September 29
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/is-it-wrong-to-try-to-pick-up-girls-in-a-dungeon-familia-myth-battle-chronicle-for-ps5-ps4-to-end-service-on-september-29

  • PS4
  • PS5

PC, iOS, and Android versions to remain in service.

The PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 versions of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth Battle Chronicle will end service on September 29, Aiming announced.

Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth Battle Chronicle first launched for PC, iOS, and Android on August 24, 2023, followed by PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on February 13, 2024. The PC, iOS, and Android versions will remain in service.

Paid Selas sales for the PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 versions will end on July 30.

Here is an overview of the game, via Aiming:

About

An all-new action RPG for the popular anime series “Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?”!

World of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? in 3D with Fully Voiced Dialogue!

  • Enjoy the story of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? together with your favorite characters brought to life via anime-style 3D graphics!
  • Experience game-exclusive movies and famous scenes drawn at totally different angles from the anime!
  • Also together with original stories only found in Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth Battle Chronicle!

Simple Yet Exhilarating Battles

  • Monsters await you in the Dungeon where you can make use of a variety of attacks, evades, character switches, and more!
  • Perform your favorite deadly attacks, including Firebolt and Lil Rafaga, in spectacular fashion. Go adventuring with your favorite characters!

Enjoy the Game With Other Players Through the “Magic Stone Scramble” and “United Final Battle”

  • Everyone else is an enemy! Enjoy the 8-player battle royale “Magic Stone Scramble.”
  • Fight real-time battles against formidable foes with up to four players in the cooperative “United Final Battle,” and many more ways to play the game!

Numerous Characters Played by a Star-studded Cast of Voice Actors

  • Bell Cranel (voiced by Yoshitsugu Matsuoka)
  • Hestia (voiced by Inori Minase)
  • Welf Crozzo (voiced by Yoshimasa Hosoya)
  • Liliruca Arde (voiced by Maaya Uchida)
  • Yamato Mikoto (voiced by Chinatsu Akasaki)
  • Sanjouno Haruhime (voiced byHaruka Chisuga)
  • Ryu Lion (voiced by Saori Hayami)
  • Ais Wallenstein (voiced by Saori Onishi)
  • …and more!
